item.title: Washington, D.C., Feels Neither Safe Nor Clean Because It’s Not
item.description: When your daily life in a city is marked by a series of fearsome conversations, signs of squalor, and dangerous encounters, no rational person can cal...

item.title: Beto O’Rourke Is The Political Wart That Won’t Go Away
item.description: The sugar daddy of temper-tantrum-throwing Texas Democrats appears to be ramping up for another losing political campaign.

item.title: Drunk, Belligerent Vagrants Blockade The Federalist’s Office As Leftist Journalists Insist DC Is America’s Purest City
item.description: The squalor that those living and working in the city are forced to endure is unbecoming of the nation's capital.

item.title: Chinese Immigrants Create 21 Children Via Surrogate Before Allegedly Abusing Them
item.description: While investigating allegations of abuse, police discovered 15 children under the age of three in the Chinese couple's L.A. mansion.

item.title: No, Trump Hasn’t Gone Soft On Silicon Valley Monopolies
item.description: President Trump’s antitrust team isn’t pro-monopolies. It's pro-consumer, pro-competition, and pro-America.
